name: Glowing Tunes
description:
Week 6

Theme is legerdemain 

Made 3 physic rolling ball levels with a nice sound track to listen to while playing!

this week was pretty neat and small for me but found the end result was a fun small game and I'm going to explore more into the glide level for a future project for Uni.

Controls

WASD to roll around

Credits

The main code I followed a tutorial by Jonas Tyroller - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_p_9arduPuxM8DHTGIuSOg

and the Music by TheFatRat - https://www.youtube.com/user/ThisIsTheFatRat
